data.message: Dear Facebook my name is angel I have a very serious situation and I need to speak to somebody as soon as possible since I had this problem I deleted my messenger and I can't seem to find a way to message you except through here I would appreciate if you contact me somehow preferably at my phone you know my number you know how to contact me anywhere that you can contact me about the seriousness of this situation I would appreciate it somebody has hacked your computer and contacted me through a relative of mines phone

replies.message: Hey Angel. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://on.fb.me/1NRS7Xk. -Jordan

No it wasn't through my accounts you cannot call yourself through your own account they called me through my cousins messenger and they said our mission is to terrorize you, I called my cousin instantly and I asked him did you call me he replied I was playing a game and the phone started dialing by itself I picked up the phone and put my ear to it he says but I didn't hear anything. the only way that could have been done was by someone inside your company calling through his phone in messenger to mine in messenger. I appreciate you replying but you should look into this.

Angel Godfatha Villalobos actually if someone hacked your cousin the they can call you from your cousins account. You cousin needs to change his password. Facebook doesn't sit around trying to terrorize people.

Patricia you don't understand what happened is that I comment about our Lord Jesus on one of the ISIS videos and instantly the call came in from my cousins phone which wasn't my cousin and a computer voice said our mission is to terrorize you, which means Isis needs to terrorize the USA
Sorry I couldn't help but to laugh 😏😂
MizzLdy Clazz I'm glad you think its funny is nothing funny about being threatened
Angel wen ppl know better they do better I hope FB find out whats goin on
ฉันต้องการทราบเจตนาที่แท้จริง ของการแทรกแซง  โปรดตอบคำถามของฉันด้วย?
